column4: hi there, is it possible to run an update (oneiric) from a usk disk whe i'm on  live (intrepid) ?
it's not really worth updating the livecd
unless I've miss understood what you are asking
i need to upgrade an old installation to oneiric but i have only the image and the livecd
ahhh, I seee what you're asking
what is the old version ?
I personally would not advise an upgrade like that
the jump in gnome versions and kernel versions (and therefore associated libraries) would take a long long time and not be the most stable process
ok, i can reinstall from the scratch
that would be my advise yes
which image i need to download ?
which ever one you want
but i will need to launch it from a livecd
yes,
but i cannot burn a cd
you can download the images and use it on an USB stick,
I personally don't like that process, but it is possible,
!install
and boot from the usb stick?
correct
i cannot boot from a usb device!
see the link ubottu just posted
then you cannot do it
